ValidationRule.description: Ensures that a scheduled event is not longer than 30 days.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ((ISPICKVAL(Status__c ,"Scheduled") || ISPICKVAL(Status__c ,"Venue Set") || ISPICKVAL(Status__c ,"Program Set") || ISPICKVAL(Status__c ,"In-Production") || ISPICKVAL(Status__c ,"Completed")) && (Event_End_Date__c > TODAY()) && ((Event_End_Date__c - Event_Start_Date__c) > 30))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A scheduled event cannot be more than 30 days long.
